1ba59997e3db8ecd047f7f843124d45369f88e46.commit.message:
Moved ListDelimiterHandler to convert package.

When moving the implementation classes to the convert package the interface was
simply forgotten.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517186 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
1ba59997e3db8ecd047f7f843124d45369f88e46.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

d578f402df55e2b52c51c0661e20d76d9da0d59c.commit.message:
Removed obsolete method and made PropertyConverter package protected.

The PropertyConverter class is now only accessed by DefaultConversionHandler.
For other components, there is no need to call low-level conversion methods
directly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516583 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
d578f402df55e2b52c51c0661e20d76d9da0d59c.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

52e20c130f00d26141bdc7f49817cec06501716e.commit.message:
Removed references to PropertyConverter.

These references mainly occurred in JavaDocs. They were outdated anyway (all
conversions are now done by the conversion handler which does not necessarily
call PropertyConverter).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516582 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
52e20c130f00d26141bdc7f49817cec06501716e.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

593c0da150ef0725322b26ebc94a8743a76c6341.commit.message:
Made configuration field private and final.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516581 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
593c0da150ef0725322b26ebc94a8743a76c6341.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

fe2dcf38225a652ec1784d4d42af05dc663d323a.commit.message:
Reworked DataConfiguration to use the generic get() methods.

All special data conversion methods are now based on the generic methods
provided by AbstractConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516580 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
fe2dcf38225a652ec1784d4d42af05dc663d323a.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

9f684df63f7fbfaa0fdab857732a91775f4bfec8.commit.message:
The get() methods now handle the throwExceptionOnMissing flag correctly.

Previously, the methods did not throw an exception if the key could not be
resolved and the flag was set.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516579 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
9f684df63f7fbfaa0fdab857732a91775f4bfec8.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

5d0135fa0e7e02f410696bea2df792bd01ac63a5.commit.message:
Added a special handling for empty elements.

When converting to a list or to an array it makes sense to handle empty
elements in a configuration in a special way - rather than returning a
collection with a single empty element, an empty collection should be
returned. This is now implemented by DefaultConversionHandler. A new method was
added which determines whether an element is empty. So this can be customized
by subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516578 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
5d0135fa0e7e02f410696bea2df792bd01ac63a5.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

1a547fa4c07f5cf51183cc8cc23879838b42a2b4.commit.message:
Changed handling of return values for getList() and getCollection().

If the passed in key cannot be resolved and the default value is null, the
methods now return null rather than an empty collection. This is the
behavior which was used by DataConfiguration in version 1.x, and it makes
sense to return the default value directly if no data is found.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516577 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
1a547fa4c07f5cf51183cc8cc23879838b42a2b4.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

33ddcbf37b5ee71ae15a1d4bd52f27d94d7b9820.commit.message:
Removed direct dependency to PropertyConverter.

Data type conversions are now performed by a ConversionHandler object. The
ConversionHandler instance to be used can be passed to the constructor of
DefaultBeanFactory. Alternatively, a default instance is used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516575 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
33ddcbf37b5ee71ae15a1d4bd52f27d94d7b9820.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

82c7256b626610186111bbc8b8f9aeed6bbc27c9.commit.message:
Fixed a problem with conversions to primitive data types.

In this case, the Class.cast() method cannot be used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516574 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
